answers.body: Some topic just about how it works would be nice. Not about internals, we should have another topic for that, but instead for `what does this mean` on ZeroHello.

comments.body:
@Krixano: There isn't MySQLExchange or JavaScriptExchange, though there is AskUbuntu and ServerFault. So I think `primary tag` is Ubuntu and there are some `secondary tags` - you see, we use the same words but with different meanings.

Then, we should think if HowToUseZeroNet is a big enough topic. I think nope, so probably you are right.
